sentences.en: Highprecision close loop orientation control is achieved with stepper motor position feedback.
sentences.cn: 通过位置反馈,可以实现步进电机的高精度闭环定位控制.

sentences.en: It is possible to drive unipolar stepper motors with bipolar drivers.
sentences.cn: 使用多极驱动器可以驱动单极步进马达.

sentences.en: Made by L 298 chip stepper motor driver circuit.
sentences.cn: 采用L298芯片做成步进电机驱动电路.

sentences.en: MCU controlled stepper motor driver chips: A 3972, achieving 64 segments.
sentences.cn: 用单片机控制步进电机驱动芯片: A3972, 实现64细分.

sentences.en: Mount the stepper motors to the feed mechanism of machine tool.
sentences.cn: 安装步进电动机供给车床的机械装置.

sentences.en: Stepper motor control is simple, accurate positioning and so on.
sentences.cn: 步进电机具有控制简便 、 定位准确等特点.

sentences.en: Stepper motor driver circuit using mainly driven ULN 2803 chip.
sentences.cn: 驱动步进电机电路主要利用ULN2803作为驱动芯片.

sentences.en: Stepper motor drivers head the list of output devices.
sentences.cn: 步进马达驱动器在输出设备中排在首位.

sentences.en: Stepper motor import high reliability, driven, anti - oil capacity, fuel consumption Province.
sentences.cn: 进口步进电机可靠性高, 驱动力大, 抗 油污能力强, 耗油省.

sentences.en: Stepper motor is of varying load mechanism, high precision and reliability.
sentences.cn: 步进电机变负荷机构, 精度高,可靠性好.

sentences.en: Stepper motors are rated by the torque they produce.
sentences.cn: 步进马达依靠自身产生的扭矩达到额定.

sentences.en: Study on Stepper Motor Arc Stud Welding Gun and Control System.
sentences.cn: 步进式电弧螺柱焊枪及控制系统的研究.

sentences.en: The stepper driver guarantees stepper running high - efficiency and lower power loss.
sentences.cn: 步进电机驱动器保证步进电机高效率、低功耗运行.

sentences.en: Then there had been the pleasurable excitement of choosing a showy grey stepper for May's brougham.
sentences.cn: 后来为了给梅的马车选一匹体面的灰色快马,他愉快地激动了一阵.

sentences.en: This process is a breakdown of stepper motor driver chip drives A 3972.
sentences.cn: 这段程序是步进电机的细分驱动程序,驱动芯片是A3972.

words.tran_cn: 妻与前夫所生的孩子；夫与前妻所生子女；受到冷落的人或物
跳舞者；花很多时间参加社交活动的学生；以特殊姿态行走的人或动物；分档器

trans.tran_cn: 以特殊姿态行走的人或动物，跳舞者
trans.tran_en: a person who or animal that steps, esp a horse or a dancer
